team.name: Mudassar Iqbal
team.title: Founder & Chief Executive Officer
team.bio: As CEO of TeamSolve, Mudassar leads the company's strategic direction and guides its culture of continuous improvement. With decades of experience in utility operations, he has built cutting-edge AI solutions that simplify critical infrastructure operations.

team.name: Ami Preis
team.title: Founder & Chief Operating Officer
team.bio: Ami, COO of TeamSolve, manages global operations and drives the company's growth strategy. With deep expertise in water utilities, she delivers impactful results for water, energy, and industrial sectors.

team.name: Michael Allen
team.title: Founder & Chief Technology Officer
team.bio: As CTO of TeamSolve, Michael spearheads technology development and solution engineering, ensuring the platform evolves to meet customers' needs into customers' operations.

team.name: Robin Wong
team.title: Founder & Chief Commercial Officer
team.bio: Robin, CCO of TeamSolve, leads business development, sales, and partnerships, driving growth and fostering strong client relationships across water, energy, and infrastructure sectors.

testimonials.quote: Partnering with TeamSolve has been a significant step forward for us. Their AI-powered platform provides our field teams with real-time insights, standardized procedures, and hands-on guidance, enabling better decision-making on-site.
testimonials.author: Chris Evans
testimonials.title: Detection Services Chief Executive Officer

testimonials.quote: With the Knowledge Twin's support, my staff can now work independently, significantly reducing errors and freeing up to 15% more time for other critical tasks.
testimonials.author: Mr. Lim Chee Wan
testimonials.title: Flowtech Project & Services Delivery Manager

testimonials.quote: The integration of this AI-enabled knowledge insights platform for new workflows shows great promise in reshaping BWSI's operational and workforce capabilities with more proactiveness, greater consistency and visibility.
testimonials.author: Ms. Cristina P. Alejandro
testimonials.title: BWSI President
